abstract: Edward Klein's book Blood Feud: The Clintons vs. the Obamas, 320-page unauthorized and barely sourced account full of implausible passages, knocks Hillary Clinton's memoir Hard Choices from top spot on best-seller list.
lead_paragraph: Edward Klein’s “Blood Feud: The Clintons vs. the Obamas,” a 320-page unauthorized and barely sourced account, has toppled “Hard Choices” from its spot on the best-seller list.

keywords.value: Blood Feud: The Clintons vs. the Obamas (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and ALEXANDRA ALTER

headline.main: A Provocateur’s Book on Hillary Clinton Overtakes Her Memoir in Sales
headline.print_headline: A Provocateur’s Book on Clinton Overtakes Her Memoir in Sales
headline.seo: ‘Blood Feud’ vs. ‘Hard Choices’ in Hillary Clinton Book Battle

snippet: Edward Klein’s “Blood Feud: The Clintons vs. the Obamas,” a 320-page unauthorized and barely sourced account, has toppled “Hard Choices” from its spot on the best-seller list....
